title: Resources discovered
creator_credit: Beechdale Educational Films and Walter F. Broome
brief_description: The services which the public library can provide for industry and commerce. How in particular the smaller concern which cannot afford its own special library can through the public library have access to all the information resources of the nation. The way in which the librarian deals with the specific enquiries of different kinds it shown.
